00051 // boundary constraint for real part of a
00052 #define MINIMUMA 0.0001
00053 #define ALLOWEDJ2DEVIATION 0.1
00054 #define ENERGYPENALTY 10000.0/hbc
00055 
00056 
00057 // perform projection in body-fixed system
00058 // to do that the body-fixed system is rotated into
00059 // the lab system, the gradients have then to be
00060 // rotated back
00061 
00062 #define ORIENTED
00063 
00064 // randomize the azimuthal angles to avoid
00065 // falling into spurious minima
00066 
00067 // #define RANDOMIZED
00068 
00069 
00070 #ifdef ORIENTED
00071 #include "fmd/SpatialOrientation.h"
00072 #endif

00074 // signal handling with MPI jobs is too complicated
00075 
00076 #ifndef MPI

00079 volatile sig_atomic_t sigterminate;
00080 
00081 void catchterminate(int sig)
00082 {
00083   sigterminate = 1;
00084   fprintf(stderr, "... catched signal - terminate minimization\n");
00085   signal(sig, catchterminate);
00086 }

00092 static struct {
00093   int log;
00094   const char* logfile;
00095   int maxsteps;
00096   const Interaction* Int;
00097   int j;
00098   int k;
00099   int par;
00100   angintegrationpara* projpar;
00101   int nangles;
00102   const Constraint* Const;
00103   int nconst;
00104   Para* q;
00105   Parameterization* P;
00106   SlaterDet* Q;
00107   SlaterDet* Qp;

00115 static struct {
00116   SlaterDet* Qp;
00117   SlaterDet* Qpp;
00118   SlaterDetAux* X;
00119 } Work;

00122 #ifdef ORIENTED
00123 static double lalpha0;
00124 static double lbeta0;
00125 static double lgamma0;
00126 
00127 #define M_2PI (2*M_PI)
00128 #define M_PI2 (M_PI*M_PI)
00129 
00130 inline static double dabs(double x) { if (x<0) return -x; else return x; };
00131 
00132 inline static double mod2pi(double a) { return (a - floor(a/M_2PI)*M_2PI); }
00133 
00134 inline static double diffang(double a, double b)
00135 {
00136   return (M_PI - dabs(M_PI-mod2pi(a-b)));
00137 }
00138 
00139 int orientationinverted(double alpha, double beta, double gamma,
00140                         double lalpha, double lbeta, double lgamma)
00141 {
00142   // if we are away from beta = pi/2 only look at beta
00143   // if we are close to beta = pi/2 also look at alpha
00144   if ((diffang(beta, M_PI_2) > 0.1 && 
00145        diffang(M_PI-beta, lbeta) < diffang(beta, lbeta)) ||
00146       (diffang(beta, M_PI_2) <= 0.1 && 
00147        diffang(M_PI-beta, lbeta)+diffang(alpha-M_PI, lalpha) < 
00148        diffang(beta, lbeta)+diffang(alpha, lalpha)))
00149     return 1;
00150   else
00151     return 0;
00152 }
00153 
00154 
00155 void invertangles(double* alpha, double* beta, double* gamma)
00156 {
00157   *alpha = mod2pi(*alpha - M_PI);
00158   *beta  = M_PI - *beta;
00159   *gamma = mod2pi(M_PI - *gamma);
00160 }
00161 #endif
00162 
00163 
00164 void initWork(const SlaterDet* Q)
00165 {
00166   Work.Qp = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00167   Work.Qpp = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00168   Work.X = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDetAux));
00169 
00170   initSlaterDet(Q, Work.Qp);
00171   initSlaterDet(Q, Work.Qpp);
00172   initSlaterDetAux(Q, Work.X);
00173 }
00174 
00175 
00176 void calcprojectedHamiltonian(const SlaterDet* Q, 
00177                               const Interaction* Int,
00178                               int j, int k, int par, 
00179                               angintegrationpara* projpar,
00180                               double* eintr, double* eproj)
00181 {
00182   SlaterDet* Qp = Work.Qp;
00183   SlaterDet* Qpp = Work.Qpp;
00184   SlaterDetAux* X = Work.X;
00185 
00186   int n = projpar->n;
00187 
00188   double alpha, beta, gamma, w;
00189 #ifdef ORIENTED
00190   double alpha0, beta0, gamma0;
00191 #endif
00192   complex double hme, nme, j2me;
00193   complex double H=0.0, N=0.0, J2=0.0;
00194    
00195   complex double hintr, nintr;
00196 
00197   copySlaterDet(Q, Qp);
00198 #ifdef ORIENTED
00199   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, X);
00200   calcOrientedOrientation(Qp, X, &alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
00201   if (orientationinverted(alpha0, beta0, gamma0, lalpha0, lbeta0, lgamma0))
00202     invertangles(&alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
00203   fprintf(stderr, "... (alpha, beta, gamma) = (%5.2f, %5.2f, %5.2f)\n",
00204           alpha0*180/M_PI, beta0*180/M_PI, gamma0*180/M_PI); 
00205   rotateSlaterDet(Qp, -gamma0, -beta0, -alpha0);
00206 #endif
00207 
00208   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, X);
00209 
00210   if (isnan(X->ovlap)) {
00211     *eintr = ENERGYPENALTY;
00212     *eproj = ENERGYPENALTY;
00213     return;
00214   }
00215 
00216   nintr = X->ovlap;
00217   calcHamiltonianod(Int, Qp, Qp, X, &hintr);
00218 
00219   *eintr = hintr/nintr;
00220 
00221 #ifdef RANDOMIZED
00222   double alpharan, gammaran;
00223   alpharan = 0.005*2*M_PI*rand()/RAND_MAX;
00224   gammaran = 0.005*2*M_PI*rand()/RAND_MAX;
00225 #endif
00226 
00227   int i, ip;
00228   for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
00229     copySlaterDet(Qp, Qpp);
00230 
00231     getangintegrationpoint(i, projpar, &alpha, &beta, &gamma, &w);
00232 #ifdef RANDOMIZED
00233     alpha += alpharan;
00234     gamma += gammaran;
00235 #endif
00236 
00237     rotateSlaterDet(Qpp, alpha, beta, gamma);
00238     for (ip=0; ip<=1; ip++) {
00239       if (ip) invertSlaterDet(Qpp);
00240       calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qpp, X);
00241       nme = X->ovlap;
00242       calcHamiltonianod(Int, Qp, Qpp, X, &hme);
00243       calcConstraintJ2od(Qp, Qpp, X, &j2me);
00244 
00245       H += w/2*(ip ? par : 1)*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*Djmkstar(j,k,k,alpha,beta,gamma)*hme;
00246       N += w/2*(ip ? par : 1)*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*Djmkstar(j,k,k,alpha,beta,gamma)*nme;
00247       J2 += w/2*(ip ? par : 1)*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*Djmkstar(j,k,k,alpha,beta,gamma)*j2me;
00248     }
00249   }
00250 
00251   fprintf(stderr, "... n: %9.7f, J2: %6.3f\n", 
00252           creal(N/nintr), 
00253           creal(J2/N));
00254 
00255   if (dabs(J2/N - 0.5*j*(0.5*j+1.0)) > ALLOWEDJ2DEVIATION) {
00256     *eintr = ENERGYPENALTY;
00257     *eproj = ENERGYPENALTY;
00258     return;
00259   }
00260 
00261   *eproj = creal(H/N);
00262 }

00264 
00265 #ifdef MPI
00266 void calcprojectedHamiltonianmpi(const SlaterDet* Q, 
00267                                  const Interaction* Int,
00268                                  int j, int k, int par, 
00269                                  angintegrationpara* angpara,
00270                                  double* eintr, double* eproj)
00271 {
00272   SlaterDet* Qp = Work.Qp;
00273   SlaterDetAux* X = Work.X;
00274 
00275   int nang = angpara->n;
00276 
00277 #ifdef ORIENTED
00278   double alpha0, beta0, gamma0;
00279 #endif
00280 
00281   complex double H=0.0, N=0.0, J2=0.0;
00282    
00283   complex double hintr, nintr;
00284 
00285   copySlaterDet(Q, Qp);
00286 #ifdef ORIENTED
00287   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, X);
00288   calcOrientedOrientation(Qp, X, &alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
00289   if (orientationinverted(alpha0, beta0, gamma0, lalpha0, lbeta0, lgamma0)) {
00290     fprintf(stderr, "... angles inverted\n");
00291     invertangles(&alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
00292   }
00293   fprintf(stderr, "... (alpha, beta, gamma) = (%5.2f, %5.2f, %5.2f)\n",
00294           alpha0*180/M_PI, beta0*180/M_PI, gamma0*180/M_PI); 
00295   rotateSlaterDet(Qp, -gamma0, -beta0, -alpha0);
00296 #endif
00297 
00298   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, X);
00299 
00300   if (isnan(X->ovlap)) {
00301     *eintr = ENERGYPENALTY;
00302     *eproj = ENERGYPENALTY;
00303     return;
00304   }
00305 
00306   nintr = X->ovlap;
00307   calcHamiltonianod(Int, Qp, Qp, X, &hintr);
00308   *eintr = hintr/nintr;
00309 
00310 #ifdef RANDOMIZED
00311   double alpharan, gammaran;
00312   alpharan = 0.005*2*M_PI*rand()/RAND_MAX;
00313   gammaran = 0.005*2*M_PI*rand()/RAND_MAX;
00314 #endif
00315 
00316   int task = TASKHAMILTONIANOD;
00317   BroadcastTask(&task);
00318 
00319   BroadcastSlaterDet(Qp);
00320   BroadcastSlaterDet(Qp);
00321 
00322   int todo = nang;
00323   int running=0;
00324   int done=0;
00325   int processor;
00326   MPI_Status status;
00327 
00328   // processor 0 is master
00329   double angle[mpisize][3];
00330   double weight[mpisize];
00331   double projpar[3];
00332   
00333   // which slaves are working, at beginning none
00334   int i;
00335   int working[mpisize];
00336   for (i=1; i<mpisize; i++)
00337     working[i] = 0;
00338 
00339   complex double h[2], n[2], j2[2];
00340 
00341   int next=0;
00342   while (done<todo) {
00343 
00344     if (next<todo && running < mpisize-1) {     // supply slaves with work
00345 
00346       // find empty slave
00347       for (i=1; i<mpisize; i++)
00348         if (!working[i]) {
00349           processor = i;
00350           break;
00351         }
00352 
00353       getangintegrationpoint(next, angpara, &angle[processor][0], &angle[processor][1], &angle[processor][2], &weight[processor]); 
00354 
00355       for (int a=0; a<3; a++)
00356         projpar[a] = angle[processor][a];
00357 
00358       MPI_Send(projpar, 3, MPI_DOUBLE, processor, TAGPROJECT3, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00359 
00360       working[processor] = 1;
00361       running++;
00362       next++;
00363 
00364     } else {                                    // collect results from slaves
00365 
00366       MPI_Recv(h, 2, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, 
00367                MPI_ANY_SOURCE, TAGHAMILTONIANOD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00368       processor = status.MPI_SOURCE;
00369 
00370       MPI_Recv(n, 2, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, 
00371                processor, TAGOVLAPOD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00372       MPI_Recv(j2, 2, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, 
00373                processor, TAGANGULARMOMENTUMOD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00374 
00375       complex double w;
00376       w = weight[processor]*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*Djmkstar(j,k,k,angle[processor][0],angle[processor][1],angle[processor][2]);
00377 
00378       H += w/2*(h[0] + par* h[1]);
00379       N += w/2*(n[0] + par* n[1]);
00380       J2 += w/2*(j2[0] + par* j2[1]);
00381 
00382       working[processor] = 0;
00383       running--;
00384       done++;
00385     }
00386 
00387   }
00388 
00389   // tell slaves we have finished
00390   projpar[0] = -1.0;
00391   for (processor=1; processor<mpisize; processor++) {
00392     MPI_Send(projpar, 3, MPI_DOUBLE, processor, TAGPROJECT3, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00393   }     
00394 
00395   fprintf(stderr, "... n: %9.7f, J2: %6.3f\n", 
00396           creal(N/nintr), 
00397           creal(J2/N));
00398 
00399   if (dabs(J2/N - 0.5*j*(0.5*j+1.0)) > ALLOWEDJ2DEVIATION) {
00400     *eintr = ENERGYPENALTY;
00401     *eproj = ENERGYPENALTY;
00402     return;
00403   }
00404 
00405   *eproj = creal(H/N);
00406 }
00407 #endif
00408 
00409 
00410 void calcgradprojectedHamiltonian(const SlaterDet* Q, 
00411                                   const Interaction* Int,
00412                                   int j, int k, int par, 
00413                                   angintegrationpara* projpar,
00414                                   double* eintr, double* eproj)
00415 {
00416   SlaterDet* Qp = Min.Qp;
00417   SlaterDet* Qpp = Min.Qpp;
00418   SlaterDetAux* X = Min.X;
00419   gradSlaterDetAux* dX = Min.dX;
00420   gradSlaterDet* dH = Min.dH;
00421   gradSlaterDet* dN = Min.dN;
00422   gradSlaterDet* dh = Min.dh;
00423   gradSlaterDet* dn = Min.dn;
00424 
00425   int n = projpar->n;
00426   double alpha, beta, gamma, w;
00427 #ifdef ORIENTED
00428   double alpha0, beta0, gamma0;
00429 #endif
00430 
00431   complex double H=0.0, N=0.0;
00432   zerogradSlaterDet(dH);
00433   zerogradSlaterDet(dN);
00434 
00435   copySlaterDet(Q, Qp);
00436 #ifdef ORIENTED
00437   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, X);
00438   calcOrientedOrientation(Qp, X, &alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
00439   if (orientationinverted(alpha0, beta0, gamma0, lalpha0, lbeta0, lgamma0)) {
00440     fprintf(stderr, "... angles inverted\n");
00441     invertangles(&alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
00442   }
00443   fprintf(stderr, "... (alpha, beta, gamma) = (%5.2f, %5.2f, %5.2f)\n",
00444           alpha0*180/M_PI, beta0*180/M_PI, gamma0*180/M_PI); 
00445   rotateSlaterDet(Qp, -gamma0, -beta0, -alpha0);
00446 
00447   lalpha0 = alpha0; lbeta0 = beta0; lgamma0 = gamma0;
00448 #endif
00449 
00450   complex double hintr, nintr;
00451   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, X);
00452   nintr = X->ovlap;
00453   calcHamiltonianod(Int, Qp, Qp, X, &hintr);
00454 
00455   *eintr= creal(hintr/nintr);
00456 
00457 #ifdef RANDOMIZED
00458   double alpharan, gammaran;
00459   alpharan = 0.005*2*M_PI*rand()/RAND_MAX;
00460   gammaran = 0.005*2*M_PI*rand()/RAND_MAX;
00461 #endif
00462 
00463   int i, ip;
00464   for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
00465     copySlaterDet(Qp, Qpp);
00466 
00467     getangintegrationpoint(i, projpar, &alpha, &beta, &gamma, &w);
00468 #ifdef RANDOMIZED
00469     alpha += alpharan;
00470     gamma += gammaran;
00471 #endif
00472 
00473     rotateSlaterDet(Qpp, alpha, beta, gamma);
00474 
00475     for (ip=0; ip<=1; ip++) {
00476       if (ip) invertSlaterDet(Qpp);
00477       calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qpp, X);
00478       calcgradSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qpp, X, dX);
00479       calcgradOvlapod(Qp, Qpp, X, dX, dn);
00480       dn->val = X->ovlap;
00481       calcgradHamiltonianod(Int, Qp, Qpp, X, dX, dh);
00482  
00483       H += w/2*(ip ? par : 1)*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*Djmkstar(j,k,k,alpha,beta,gamma)*dh->val;
00484       N += w/2*(ip ? par : 1)*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*Djmkstar(j,k,k,alpha,beta,gamma)*dn->val;
00485 
00486       addmulttogradSlaterDet(dH, dh, w/2*(ip ? par : +1)*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*Djmkstar(j,k,k,alpha,beta,gamma));
00487       addmulttogradSlaterDet(dN, dn, w/2*(ip ? par : +1)*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*Djmkstar(j,k,k,alpha,beta,gamma));
00488     }
00489   }
00490 
00491   *eproj = creal(H/N);
00492 
00493   multgradSlaterDet(dH, 1.0/N);
00494   addmulttogradSlaterDet(dH, dN, -H/(N*N));
00495 
00496 #ifdef ORIENTED
00497   rotategradSlaterDet(dH, alpha0, beta0, gamma0);
00498 #endif
00499 }                                 
00500 
00501 
00502 #ifdef MPI
00503 void calcgradprojectedHamiltonianmpi(const SlaterDet* Q, 
00504                                      const Interaction* Int,
00505                                      int j, int k, int par, 
00506                                      angintegrationpara* angpara,
00507                                      double* eintr, double* eproj)
00508 {
00509   SlaterDet* Qp = Min.Qp;
00510   SlaterDet* Qpp = Min.Qpp;
00511   SlaterDetAux* X = Min.X;
00512   gradSlaterDetAux* dX = Min.dX;
00513   gradSlaterDet* dH = Min.dH;
00514   gradSlaterDet* dN = Min.dN;
00515   gradSlaterDet* dh = Min.dh;
00516   gradSlaterDet* dn = Min.dn;
00517 
00518   int nang = angpara->n;
00519 #ifdef ORIENTED
00520   double alpha0, beta0, gamma0;
00521 #endif
00522 
00523   complex double H=0.0, N=0.0;
00524   zerogradSlaterDet(dH);
00525   zerogradSlaterDet(dN);
00526 
00527   copySlaterDet(Q, Qp);
00528 #ifdef ORIENTED
00529   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, X);
00530   calcOrientedOrientation(Qp, X, &alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
00531   if (orientationinverted(alpha0, beta0, gamma0, lalpha0, lbeta0, lgamma0)) {
00532     fprintf(stderr, "... angles inverted\n");
00533     invertangles(&alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
00534   }
00535   fprintf(stderr, "... (alpha, beta, gamma) = (%5.2f, %5.2f, %5.2f)\n",
00536           alpha0*180/M_PI, beta0*180/M_PI, gamma0*180/M_PI); 
00537   rotateSlaterDet(Qp, -gamma0, -beta0, -alpha0);
00538 
00539   lalpha0 = alpha0; lbeta0 = beta0; lgamma0 = gamma0;
00540 #endif
00541 
00542   complex double hintr, nintr;
00543   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Qp, Qp, X);
00544   nintr = X->ovlap;
00545   calcHamiltonianod(Int, Qp, Qp, X, &hintr);
00546 
00547   *eintr= creal(hintr/nintr);
00548 
00549 #ifdef RANDOMIZED
00550   double alpharan, gammaran;
00551   alpharan = 0.005*2*M_PI*rand()/RAND_MAX;
00552   gammaran = 0.005*2*M_PI*rand()/RAND_MAX;
00553 #endif
00554 
00555   int task = TASKGRADHAMILTONIANOD;
00556   BroadcastTask(&task);
00557 
00558   BroadcastSlaterDet(Qp);
00559   BroadcastSlaterDet(Qp);
00560 
00561   int todo = nang;
00562   int running=0;
00563   int done=0;
00564   int processor;
00565   MPI_Status status;
00566 
00567   // processor 0 is master
00568   double angle[mpisize][3];
00569   double weight[mpisize];
00570   double projpar[3];
00571   
00572   // which slaves are working, at beginning none
00573   int i;
00574   int working[mpisize];
00575   for (i=1; i<mpisize; i++)
00576     working[i] = 0;
00577 
00578 
00579   int next=0;
00580   while (done<todo) {
00581 
00582     if (next<todo && running < mpisize-1) {     // supply slaves with work
00583 
00584       // find empty slave
00585       for (i=1; i<mpisize; i++)
00586         if (!working[i]) {
00587           processor = i;
00588           break;
00589         }
00590 
00591       getangintegrationpoint(next, angpara, &angle[processor][0], &angle[processor][1], &angle[processor][2], &weight[processor]); 
00592       for (int k=0; k<3; k++)
00593         projpar[k] = angle[processor][k];
00594 
00595       MPI_Send(projpar, 3, MPI_DOUBLE, processor, TAGPROJECT3, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00596 
00597       working[processor] = 1;
00598       running++;
00599       next++;
00600 
00601     } else {                                    // collect results from slaves
00602 
00603       // wait for first value, identify slave, then recv all the other stuff from this slave
00604 
00605       MPI_Recv(&dh->val, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, MPI_ANY_SOURCE, TAGGRADHAMILTONIANODVAL, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00606 
00607       processor = status.MPI_SOURCE;
00608       complex double w;
00609       w = weight[processor]*(j+1)/(8*M_PI2)*Djmkstar(j,k,k,angle[processor][0],angle[processor][1],angle[processor][2]);
00610 
00611       MPI_Recv(dh->gradval, Q->ngauss*sizeof(gradGaussian),
00612                MPI_BYTE, processor, TAGGRADHAMILTONIANODGRAD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00613 
00614       H += w/2* dh->val;
00615       addmulttogradSlaterDet(dH, dh, 0.5*w);    
00616 
00617       MPI_Recv(&dh->val, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, processor, TAGGRADHAMILTONIANODVAL, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00618       MPI_Recv(dh->gradval, Q->ngauss*sizeof(gradGaussian),
00619                MPI_BYTE, processor, TAGGRADHAMILTONIANODGRAD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00620 
00621       H += w/2*par* dh->val;
00622       addmulttogradSlaterDet(dH, dh, 0.5*par*w);
00623 
00624       MPI_Recv(&dn->val, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, processor, TAGGRADOVLAPODVAL, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00625       MPI_Recv(dn->gradval, Q->ngauss*sizeof(gradGaussian),
00626                MPI_BYTE, processor, TAGGRADOVLAPODGRAD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00627     
00628       N += w/2* dn->val;
00629       addmulttogradSlaterDet(dN, dn, 0.5*w);    
00630 
00631       MPI_Recv(&dn->val, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, processor, TAGGRADOVLAPODVAL, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00632       MPI_Recv(dn->gradval, Q->ngauss*sizeof(gradGaussian),
00633                MPI_BYTE, processor, TAGGRADOVLAPODGRAD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00634 
00635       N += w/2*par* dn->val;
00636       addmulttogradSlaterDet(dN, dn, 0.5*par*w);    
00637 
00638       working[processor] = 0;
00639       running--;
00640       done++;
00641     }
00642 
00643   }
00644 
00645   // tell slaves we have finished
00646   projpar[0] = -1.0;
00647   for (processor=1; processor<mpisize; processor++) {
00648     MPI_Send(projpar, 3, MPI_DOUBLE, processor, TAGPROJECT3, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00649   }     
00650 
00651   *eproj = creal(H/N);
00652 
00653   multgradSlaterDet(dH, 1.0/N);
00654   addmulttogradSlaterDet(dH, dN, -H/(N*N));
00655 
00656 #ifdef ORIENTED
00657   rotategradSlaterDet(dH, alpha0, beta0, gamma0);
00658 #endif
00659 }                                 
00660 #endif
00661 
00662 
00663 
00664 static void copyxtopara(const double* x, Para* q)
00665 {
00666   int i;
00667   for (i=0; i<q->n; i++)
00668     q->x[i] = x[i];
00669 }
00670 
00671 
00672 void MinimizeDONLP2proj(const Interaction* Int, int j, int k, int par,
00673                         angintegrationpara* projpar,
00674                         const Constraint* Const, int nconst,
00675                         Parameterization* P, Para* q,
00676                         int maxsteps, int log, const char* logfile)
00677 {
00678 #ifndef MPI
00679   // handler for INT and TERM signals
00680   signal(SIGINT, catchterminate);
00681   signal(SIGTERM, catchterminate);
00682 #endif
00683 
00684   Min.maxsteps = maxsteps;
00685   Min.log = log;
00686   Min.logfile = logfile;
00687   Min.Int = Int;
00688   Min.j = j;
00689   Min.k = k;
00690   Min.par = par;
00691   Min.projpar = projpar;
00692   Min.Const = Const;
00693   Min.nconst = nconst;
00694   Min.q = q;
00695   Min.P = P;
00696   Min.Q = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00697   Min.Qp = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00698   Min.Qpp = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00699   Min.X = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDetAux));
00700   Min.dX = malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDetAux));
00701   Min.dH = malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00702   Min.dN = malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00703   Min.dh = malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00704   Min.dn = malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00705   Min.P->ParainitSlaterDet(q, Min.Q);
00706   Min.P->ParainitSlaterDet(q, Min.Qp);
00707   Min.P->ParainitSlaterDet(q, Min.Qpp);
00708   initSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Min.X);
00709   initgradSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Min.dX);
00710   initgradSlaterDet(Min.Q, Min.dH);
00711   initgradSlaterDet(Min.Q, Min.dN);
00712   initgradSlaterDet(Min.Q, Min.dh);
00713   initgradSlaterDet(Min.Q, Min.dn);
00714 
00715 #ifndef MPI
00716   // regular program execution or catched signal ?
00717   if (!setjmp(env))
00718 #endif
00719     FORTRAN(donlp2)();
00720 
00721   fprintf(stderr, "donlp2 terminated because of criterium %d\n",
00722           (int) FORTRAN(o8itin).optite + 11);
00723 
00724   copyxtopara(FORTRAN(o8xdat).x, Min.q);
00725 }
00726 
00727 
00728 void FORTRAN(ef)(const double* x, double* fx)
00729 {
00730 #ifndef MPI
00731   if (sigterminate)
00732     longjmp(env, 1);
00733 #endif
00734 
00735   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
00736   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
00737 
00738   double eintr, eproj;
00739 #ifdef MPI
00740   calcprojectedHamiltonianmpi(Min.Q,
00741                            Min.Int,
00742                            Min.j, Min.k, Min.par, Min.projpar,
00743                            &eintr, &eproj);
00744 #else
00745   calcprojectedHamiltonian(Min.Q,
00746                            Min.Int,
00747                            Min.j, Min.k, Min.par, Min.projpar,
00748                            &eintr, &eproj);
00749 #endif
00750 
00751   *fx = eproj;
00752   FORTRAN(o8cnt).icf++;
00753 
00754   fprintf(stderr, "\t\t\tme      E = %8.3f MeV,   Eintr = %8.3f MeV\n", 
00755           hbc*eproj, hbc*eintr);
00756 
00757 }
00758 
00759 
00760 void FORTRAN(egradf)(const double* x, double* gradf)
00761 {
00762 #ifndef MPI
00763   if (sigterminate)
00764     longjmp(env, 1);
00765 #endif
00766 
00767   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
00768   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
00769 
00770   double eintr, eproj;
00771 
00772 #ifdef MPI
00773   calcgradprojectedHamiltonianmpi(Min.Q,
00774                                Min.Int,
00775                                Min.j, Min.k, Min.par, Min.projpar,
00776                                &eintr, &eproj);
00777 #else
00778   calcgradprojectedHamiltonian(Min.Q,
00779                                Min.Int,
00780                                Min.j, Min.k, Min.par, Min.projpar,
00781                                &eintr, &eproj);
00782 #endif
00783 
00784   Min.P->ParaprojectgradSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.dH, gradf);
00785   FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf++;
00786   fprintf(stderr, "grad %3d: \tE = %8.3f MeV,   Eintr = %8.3f MeV\n", 
00787           FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf, hbc*eproj, hbc*eintr);
00788 
00789 
00790   if (Min.log && !(FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf % Min.log)) {
00791     char logfname[255];
00792     sprintf(logfname, "%s.minproj.%03d.log", Min.logfile, FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf);
00793     FILE* logfp;
00794     if (!(logfp = fopen(logfname, "w"))) {
00795       fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", logfname);
00796     } else {
00797       fprintinfo(logfp);
00798       fprintf(logfp, "# step %3d: \tE = %8.3f MeV,   Eintr = %8.3f MeV\n", 
00799               FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf, hbc*eproj, hbc*eintr);
00800       fprintf(logfp, "\n# Parameterization\n");
00801       fprintf(logfp, "<Parameterization %s>\n", Min.P->name);
00802       Min.P->Parawrite(logfp, Min.q);
00803       fprintf(logfp, "\n# SlaterDet\n");
00804       writeSlaterDet(logfp, Min.Q);
00805       fclose(logfp);
00806     }
00807   }  
00808 
00809 }

00812 void FORTRAN(eg)(int* i, const double* x, double* gxi)
00813 {
00814   if (!strcmp(Min.P->name, "FMD")) {
00815     *gxi = x[(*i-1)*NGAUSS+APOS]-MINIMUMA;
00816   }
00817 }

00825 void FORTRAN(eh)(int* i, const double* x, double* hxi)
00826 {
00827 #ifndef MPI
00828   if (sigterminate)
00829     longjmp(env, 1);
00830 #endif
00831 
00832   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
00833   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
00834 
00835   calcSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Min.X);
00836   Min.Const[*i-1].me(Min.Q, Min.X, hxi);
00837 
00838   fprintf(stderr, "\t\t\tme   %4s = %8.3f\n", 
00839           Min.Const[*i-1].label, Min.Const[*i-1].output(*hxi));
00840 
00841   *hxi -= Min.Const[*i-1].val;
00842 }

00845 void FORTRAN(egradh)(int* i, const double* x, double* gradhi)
00846 {
00847 #ifndef MPI
00848   if (sigterminate)
00849     longjmp(env, 1);
00850 #endif
00851   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
00852   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
00853 
00854   calcSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Min.X);
00855   calcgradSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Min.X, Min.dX);
00856   zerogradSlaterDet(Min.dH);
00857   Min.Const[*i-1].gradme(Min.Q, Min.X, Min.dX, Min.dH);
00858 
00859   Min.P->ParaprojectgradSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.dH, gradhi);
00860   fprintf(stderr, "\t\t\tgrad %4s = %8.3f\n", 
00861           Min.Const[*i-1].label, Min.Const[*i-1].output(Min.dH->val));
00862 }

00864 
00865 void FORTRAN(setup0)(void)
00866 {
00867   int i;
00868 
00869   FORTRAN(o8dim).n = Min.q->n;
00870   FORTRAN(o8dim).nh = Min.nconst;
00871   // in case of FMD parametrization use bound constraints for Re{a}
00872   if (!strcmp(Min.P->name, "FMD")) {
00873     FORTRAN(o8dim).ng = Min.q->ngauss;
00874     for (i=0; i<Min.nconst+1; i++) {
00875       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][0] = -1;
00876       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][1] = 0;
00877       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][2] = 0;
00878     }
00879     for (i=0; i<Min.q->ngauss; i++) {
00880       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i+Min.nconst+1][0] = 1;
00881       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i+Min.nconst+1][1] = i*NGAUSS+APOS+1;
00882       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i+Min.nconst+1][2] = 1;
00883     }
00884     for (i=0; i<Min.q->ngauss; i++) {
00885       if (Min.q->x[i*NGAUSS+APOS] < 0)
00886         Min.q->x[i*NGAUSS+APOS] = 1.0+1.0*rand()/RAND_MAX;
00887     }
00888   } else
00889     FORTRAN(o8dim).ng = 0;
00890   FORTRAN(o8stpa).analyt = 1;
00891   FORTRAN(o8stpa).cold = 1;
00892   FORTRAN(o8par).tau0 = 20.0;
00893   FORTRAN(o8par).del0 = 1.0;
00894   FORTRAN(o8rst).nreset = 20;
00895   FORTRAN(o8stpa).silent = 1;
00896 
00897   for (i=0; i<Min.q->n; i++)
00898     FORTRAN(o8xdat).x[i] = Min.q->x[i];
00899 }
00900 
00901 
00902 void FORTRAN(setup)(void)
00903 {
00904   FORTRAN(o8stpa).te0 = 0;
00905   FORTRAN(o8stpa).te1 = 0;
00906   FORTRAN(o8par).iterma = Min.maxsteps-1;
00907 }
